dt-api.name: searchPanes.hidePanes()
dt-api.summary: Hides the div element that the panes are stored in.

type.description: Hides the div element that the panes are stored in.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to hide the div that contains the panes, effectively removing them from the display.
This method does not take any arguments as it does not impact a single pane but the entire panes display.
